Package index

Main functions

Main functions to perform an ANOPA analysis.

anopa()
ANOPA: analysis of proportions using Anscombe transform.
anopaPlot()
anopaPlot: Easy plotting of proportions.
emProportions()
emProportions: simple effect analysis of proportions.
contrastProportions()
contrastProportion: analysis of contrasts between proportions using Anscombe transform.
posthocProportions()
posthocProportions: post-hoc analysis of proportions.
anopaPower2N() anopaN2Power() anopaProp2fsq()
Computing power within the ANOPA.
GRP() rBernoulli()
Generating random proportions with GRP

Subsidiary functions

These subsidiary functions perform useful tasks.

A() varA() Atrans() SE.Atrans() var.Atrans() CI.Atrans() prop() CI.prop()
transformation functions
explain()
explain
summarize()
summarize
corrected()
corrected
uncorrected()
uncorrected
toWide() toLong() toCompiled()
Converting between formats
unitaryAlpha()
unitary alpha

Examples of data sets, ficticious, found in the main article, or from a real dataset.

minimalBSExample twoWayExample minimalWSExample twoWayWithinExample minimalMxExample minimalMxExampleCompiled
A collection of minimal Examples from various designs with one or two factors.
